Module io.netty5.codec.http

Package io.netty5.handler.codec.http.websocketx.extensions.compression

Encoder, decoder, handshakers to handle most common WebSocket Compression Extensions.

This package supports different web socket extensions. The specification currently supported are:

  • permessage-deflate
  • perframe-deflate and x-webkit-deflate-frame

See io.netty5.example.http.websocketx.client.WebSocketClient and io.netty5.example.http.websocketx.html5.WebSocketServer for usage.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeflateFrameClientExtensionHandshaker
    perframe-deflate handshake implementation.
    DeflateFrameServerExtensionHandshaker
    perframe-deflate handshake implementation.
    PerMessageDeflateClientExtensionHandshaker
    permessage-deflate handshake implementation.
    PerMessageDeflateServerExtensionHandshaker
    permessage-deflate handshake implementation.
    WebSocketClientCompressionHandler
    Extends io.netty5.handler.codec.http.websocketx.extensions.compression.WebSocketClientExtensionHandler to handle the most common WebSocket Compression Extensions.
    WebSocketServerCompressionHandler
    Extends io.netty5.handler.codec.http.websocketx.extensions.compression.WebSocketServerExtensionHandler to handle the most common WebSocket Compression Extensions.
